name: rosie
text: Something about bitches who can't pee (whether out of sheer greed or being graduates of Juilliard) seems to be a recurrent theme in Achewood.

name: behka
text: proof that pat is still one of the Dirtiest Dudes in Town

name: agika
text: A comment left by agika was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ishuta, Zefiel, littlecat, riotdejaneiro, jstegall, SchnappM, GeyserShitdick, StagnantDisplay, snitchy, Moraiat, NDCaesar, michellemarie, luckypyjamas, woof, fmercury, aHatOfPig, likeiwassaying, ArthurDentLives, RogueCheddar, Dandycorn, DavidL, alejandroadam, lazarusloafer, Madoushi, Mastronaut, pogo)

name: zefiel
text: Care to provide Examples?

name: ferdinand
text: some dickhead once told me "yo momma so old i slapped her back and her titties fell off."  i looked him in the eye with no expression on my face and told him that my mom has breast cancer.

name: slalvation
text: It is not a very sensible joke. As far as I know titties do not become less securely attached to the torso with age.

name: ford
text: slalvation, you sound like a man who has pulled on some old titties.

name: shutup_shutup
text: He didn't mean old.  He meant leprous.

name: gunsofray
text: have YOU ever yanked your grandma?

name: gunsofray
text: You can tell im fifteen because i laughed SO hard and granny-boob-yanking.

name: lexsenthur
text: Multitasking is a good skill.

name: dumase
text: A comment left by dumase was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tttt2, RedGuy, UndyingSong, GunsOfRay)

name: alejandroadam
text: this is not possible. this IS a game you play growing up in the hood, these ARE the best I have heard in many years. these are the new standarders in a bold style still forbidden in many lesser minded comunities.

name: hollybones
text: Yeah.  The Dozens.

name: thesyndicate88
text: You wanna play The Dozens? Well, The Dozens is a game. But the way I fuck your mother is a god damn shame.

name: vreeeee
text:
how'd she sink so low
used to be a pillar of the community, etc.

name: catachresis
text: Two thirds nonsensical eccentricity, one third fuckin' great momma jokes. "Yo mamma so greedy she won't pee" is something I have to use. I have to use it.

name: epicurus
text: That one is really the only one I was really into, but still enjoyable to read.

name: tombsgrave
text:
"Yo mama so greedy, she won't pee" is infinite classic.

What's the croup?

name: chaesar
text:
Croup is when your airways narrow and you have a nasty cough. I had it when I was 6 it totally sucks.

"...slaps the doorknob before she turns it" is my fave.

name: tripperday
text: My favorite too. I think that most people didn't catch the use of "turn" (short for "turn out") as slang for getting a woman to be a prostitute, with grouchy pimps being known to slap prostitutes.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: That's because you just flat made that horseshit up in your literary fantasy world. That's why most people didn't catch it.

name: zapatos
text:
Which makes it even more awesome.

The fewer people who understand an analogy, the more clever it is.

name: carlyle
text: If you find the cleverest analogy you can be the only man who knows it or else it will be less clever. This is a terrible weight on your shoulders.

name: boxus
text: good to see the cats gettin together, talkin dirty, just like old times

name: achilleselbow
text: Yea, it's little moments like this that explain why Beef and Ray still hang out with Pat despite everything.  Which is interesting, because I thought Pat didn't dig on jokes about his family.

name: boredom_man
text: There has been a formal Declaration of Style. Ray's joke about boning Pat's brother-in-law was all illegal police action; Pat is all rules of war.

name: jar
text: Yo mama's so fat, when she dances the band skips.

name: duperando
text: Your mother is so fat that when she fell over, she couldn't get back up.

name: cheeks_jd
text: Yo mummas so fat, I wanna have sex with her and not tell anyone.

name: joeyramoney
text: A comment left by joeyramoney was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ZombieJesus, fosters, Latterman, radishes, fmercury, RogueCheddar, Lereya, SotiCoto)

name: cheeks_jd
text: yo momma lives in america, my mumma australia.

name: nigelchaos
text: ZING!

name: riazm
text: yo momma's so middle class she thinks God is real.

name: mystkmanat
text: i wanted to tell you that i just literally laughed out loud.  at something i read on the internet.  you should be very proud of yourself, riazm.

name: riotdejaneiro
text:
Ok, my two cents :
Yo mama is so ugly, she was originally cast to play the baby in "Eraserhead".

Or : Yo mama is so ugly, J.R.R. Tolkien came up with Gollum after he saw a picture of her. Heyo!

name: unfun
text: I'm surprised no one else likes "dogs get calories by huffin' her mouth."  My favorite by a mile.

name: neitherman
text: Your statement no longer holds water because I too am partial to this.

name: dasilodavi
text: Yes, that one is my hands-down favorite, I laughed so hard the back part of my head was sore!

name: soticoto
text: Huffing a fully grown cat is ill-advised.

name: libelandslander
text: Yeah, the others all made me "heh" but that is the one that got the "wake the rest of the house up laugh" that I have been practicing for the last several nights.

name: chagment
text: for real? no one likes cigars and shrimp cocktail? hands down my favorite

name: kolchak
text: I love that one. Smoking a cigar and drinking a shrimp cocktail on the bus is basically the epitome of crass.

name: estutius
text: Actually, it could be more crass if you're on the bus to get a payday loan on your welfare check.

name: bixschmix
text: More crass would be Skoal instead of a cigar, all chompin' and spittin' down the center of the bus.

name: kickstart
text: Yesterday I saw a guy on the bus making his own cigarettes with some kind of contraption.  Like a little acrylic thing he put the paper and tobacco into that he clamped shut in some way.  Weird!

name: bixschmix
text: I... I have one of those. It is for rolling Jazz Cigarettes because, though I can roll them on my own, I am not very good at it.

name: ford
text:
do not be ashamed bixshmix those are handy as hell .

I have an adjustable one that can make regular or economy-size jazz cigarettes.

name: zilcho
text: do these machines also roll unforgivingly precise jays?

name: mystkmanat
text: what is a jazz cigarette?  i fear this may be some slang i have completely missed out on.

name: kickstart
text: nothin' but the jazziest for us

name: mystkmanat
text: Who are you to question Ol' Dirty Bastard's ways?

name: duperando
text:
My personal fave was the potato with a hearing aid.
I would love to see that school play.

name: jackparsons
text: yo momma so fat the sailors keep her in the hold so the ship won't fall over.

name: cousinted
text:
Maybe you could stay with yo mama
She could do your laundry and cook for you

And you should never sleep in pajamas
You might start a fire and burn your face

name: dallovich
text: Some even got on the mayor!

name: jandruff
text: It sprayed everywhere!

name: killingthejay
text: NO KNUCKLES?!

name: jandruff
text: Yo momma so fat she sat next to EVERYBODY in the 1st grade.

name: i_love_kate
text: I preferred buck teeth, myself.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: yo mama so bluesy she climbed a tree for a ten spot just to fall out of it and break her hairbrush worth ten dollars.

name: i_love_kate
text: Hey, guys, I found it!

name: fineoakstructure
text:
I get this now, having come across your "she don't pee" post just a little earlier today.

See this strip for the reference.

Of course, you were off by one letter.

name: terribleman
text: For some reason, I find this whole thing [i]extremely[i/] chubbyworthy.

name: terribleman
text: Hah, fuck.

name: drago25
text: I was waiting for the three dirtiest dudes in town to get back to their roots, it is sweet sweet music

name: mattylite
text: I think someone mentioned this before, but I agree: Onstad is awesome at drawing smoke.

name: pwb
text: The one about where the treasure is hidden made me actually laugh out loud. I love going back through the archive.

name: zapatos
text: Yo mama so nasty, not even I would fuck her!

name: fineoakstructure
text: (the joke is that zapatos is always horny and fucks most things)

name: zapatos
text: (it is important to know these things)

name: tonyhighwind
text: I need to memorize these, I always stumble when it's time for Yo' Momma.

name: tripleg
text: How do you know who wins?

name: theyang
text: Don't worry, I will give you a sign.

name: duperando
text: ... the sign will be that life is awesome

name: hannibalv
text: Does it mean anything that Beef's jokes are full-sized and punctuated?

name: theirateturk
text: Your mother is so ugly a peeping tom broke into the house to close the blinds is my favourite joke of all time

name: pigeon_street
text:
Pat may be a dick, but he's still a real person/cat that is proud to be one of the Dirtiest Dudes in Town. And Ray and Beef are his friends , goddamnit.
A comic about yo mama jokes has made me all misty-eyed. DAMN YOU ONSTAD.

name: dybrar
text: Yo mama so fat, she has smaller mamas orbiting her.

name: jsavinc
text:
Yo mamma so old, she was old enough to attend Christ's crucifixion,
and she so stupid she missed it.
but so fat she was there anyway

name: fineoakstructure
text: I am in love with this comment, even though the first line is probably a little too long

name: jsavinc
text: I know, I didn't translate it too well, I'm from Central Europe. Sorry.

name: terribleman
text: No knuckles, just cold slaps to the face.
